Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have scaly lesions on my palms and soles.
When did you first notice these lesions?
I noticed the lesions about a month ago.
Have the lesions spread or changed in appearance since you first noticed them?
The physical examination notes that the lesions appear as discrete scaly papules.
Do you have any associated symptoms like itching or pain in the affected areas?
No, I have not mentioned any itching or pain in the affected areas.
Do you have any history of similar skin issues, or is this the first occurrence?
This is the first occurrence; I don't have any family history of similar lesions.
Are you currently taking any medications, or have you started any new medications in the past few months?
I have not mentioned taking any medications.
Final Diagnosis: Palmoplantar keratoderma.
